sense.gloss: to tangle, to get tangled, to get entangled
to have poor control over (one's tongue, feet, etc.), to trip over
to become complicated, to become difficult, to become tricky, to get into a tangle, to become messy
to go to the next stage (after failing to reach a conclusion), to be carried over (e.g. to the next meeting), to go into (a run-off, overtime, extra innings, etc.)
basket star (any brittlestar of family Euryalina), basket fish
to speak unclearly, to speak inarticulately, to pronounce poorly, to slur one's words, to lisp
to trip (over one's own feet), to stumble

words.gloss: to tangle, to get tangled, to get entangled
to go to the next stage (after failing to reach a conclusion), to be carried over (e.g. to the next meeting), to go into (a run-off, overtime, extra innings, etc.)
